name: Cyprus National  e-Invoicing Platform
headAddress: Corner of Michael Karaoli and Gregori Afxentiou
goal: Promote e-invoicing in Cyprus for both the B2G and B2B transactions in order to improve efficiency, transparency and cost savings.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Participation in CEF Telecom calls, adopt EU directives and legislation.
